display_information.name: Self-Service Agent
display_information.description: AI-powered self-service agent that helps users with laptop refresh, email updates, and other IT requests
display_information.long_description:
The Self-Service Agent is an AI-powered assistant that helps employees with common IT requests like laptop refresh, email address updates, and other self-service tasks.

Features:
- Intelligent routing to appropriate agents
- Real-time responses via Slack
- Session-based conversations
- Integration with existing IT workflows

Simply send a request through your organization's request system and receive responses directly in Slack!
